thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Was greeted promptly upon entering the store and someone walked with me to my car right away to take a look at my tires. He talked me through what was going on with each tire, and knowing nothing about cars or tires I really appreciated that. I was just looking to spend the least amount of money and I didn't feel any pressure to upgrade, though options were presented. Very pleasant expirience overall.
